name: garden
about: You are standing in a sunny, Japanese garden

actions.relax: You lay down on the grass. Feels great!
actions.help: Nobody is around to help you.
actions.jump: Your body rises up two inches into the air. You're on the ground again.

name: ground
about: There is nothing particular about the ground here

name: tree
about: It's a lovely and very tall Japanese plum blossom tree

actions.hug: You give the tree a long hug.
actions.eat: Really, you think you can eat the tree?
actions.chop: Nah, you'd rather leave it as it is. Also, you can't.
actions.kick: You kick the tree. It doesn't care.
actions.punch: You punch the tree. It doesn't care.
actions.examine: There's nothing special about it. Oh, it's detachable.
actions.kiss: Smack! You got bark in your mouth.
actions.shake: You shake the tree, but nothing falls down.

name: beach
about: You are on a beautiful, white beach

actions.swim: You'd rather not go for a swim.
actions.lay: You lay down in the hot sand.

name: sand
about: The sand is pure white and very hot

name: sea
about: The sea is calm today. You see a ship on the horizon

name: ship
about: It's hard to make out the ship clearly. It seems to be a trawler

name: trawler
about: Yep, that's definitely a trawler on the horizon.

name: horizon
about: You see a ship on the horizon

name: waves
about: The waves as gently rolling onto the beach.

name: manual
about: It's a book on AI programming in Python, written by a bot

read: <on read 1>You already read it, and you're not going to read it again!
<on read 0><set read 1>As you read the Python manual your mind starts to drift. You see a vision of 100-foot robots fighting, smashing down buildings as they grapple. Your vision fades.

name: cave
about: You are in The Cave of Darkness. It's very dark in here! You hear a sound.

actions.listen: You hear a series of musical beeps, as if being played by an old IBM computer.

name: clue
about: It's a little clue written on a yellow post-it note

actions.read: <set tower.readclue 1>It says: "You have a very big pocket."

name: field
about: an open, grassy field on a hill. You see a ship on the horizon

name: tower
about: It's a big, white stone tower

enter: <on readclue 0>You don't have a clue on how to enter the tower.
actions.climb: There's no way you can climb it.

actions.work: You start making a clip house, but lose interest after a while.

name: desk
about: It's a very messy Cocobola desk

actions.use: Yeah, you really should get back to work.
actions.read: There's an inscription. It says "Stigen was here".

name: computer
about: It's a bona-fide c64 home computer

boot: <on inventory.has tree>You resume the computer using the tree in your pocket.. Congratulations, you have completed the game!<do quit game>
It's stuck while recursing a tree structure. Something is missing.
actions.kick: You kick it. The C64 is undamaged.
